changeSet.author: ssh@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Insert default Tpp Info for PostgreSQL, MariaDB or Oracle
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO tpp_info (tpp_info_id, authorisation_number, tpp_name) SELECT nextval('tpp_info_id_seq'), c.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tpp_id, 'default TPP' FROM ais_consent ) as c
INSERT INTO tpp_info (tpp_info_id, authorisation_number, tpp_name) SELECT NEXTVAL(tpp_info_id_seq), c.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tpp_id, 'default TPP' FROM ais_consent ) as c
INSERT INTO tpp_info (tpp_info_id, authorisation_number, tpp_name) SELECT tpp_info_id_seq.nextval, c.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT to_char(tpp_id) AS tpp_id, 'default TPP' FROM ais_consent ) c

changeSet.author: ssh@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Set tpp_info_id in ais_consent for PostgreSQL or Mariadb
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ais_consent SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT t.tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info AS t INNER JOIN ais_consent AS a ON t.authorisation_number = a.tpp_id AND tpp_name = 'default TPP' LIMIT 1)
INSERT INTO tpp_info_role (tpp_info_id, tpp_role) SELECT DISTINCT t.tpp_info_id, 'AISP' FROM tpp_info AS t INNER JOIN ais_consent AS a ON t.authorisation_number = a.tpp_id

changeSet.author: ssh@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Set tpp_info_id in ais_consent for Oracle
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ais_consent SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT tpp_info.tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info INNER JOIN ais_consent ON tpp_info.authorisation_number = to_char(ais_consent.tpp_id) AND tpp_name = 'default TPP' WHERE rownum = 1)
INSERT INTO tpp_info_role (tpp_info_id, tpp_role) SELECT DISTINCT tpp_info.tpp_info_id, 'AISP' FROM tpp_info INNER JOIN ais_consent ON tpp_info.authorisation_number = to_char(ais_consent.tpp_id)
